title: Improve Immune System Through Ayurveda - Dr. Shekhar
description: AAPNA - Association of Ayurvedic Professionals of North America is a 501(c)(6) membership organization committed to bringing together Ayurvedic professionals from around the globe to share the knowledge and wisdom of Ayurveda. Join us today.
